## Block.dispose() method

Dispose of this block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dispose(healStack?: boolean): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

healStack


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, then try to heal any gap by connecting the next statement with the previous statement. Otherwise, dispose of all children of this block.
